column5: I would like to personally thank all those who have supported me from OFC/OFC/OFC in my various ventures over my many years of membership here. I feel very blessed.  I am now in a position to give back as well.  Looking forward to supporting more events put on by OFCers in 2012.  From the Harrison Family to yours, Happy Holidays and Thank you.
Merry Christmas Phil! Wyatt says hi!  S.
Merry Christmas to you ands yours Phil.  BTW do you sell them perch Santa Hats in your photo? There are the bomb  :thumbsup_anim:
Hey Phil  If you didnt sell quality,I wouldnt be buying my friend.   Merry Christmas to you and yours my friend.
Man we miss him, but we know he is very happy.  Give him some turkey for me!   Ha! Those Simcoe perch are special, thats for sure!   Thanks Brian!!!  have an eye for the mummers.
All the best to you and yours this Christmas too Phil!
All the best to you and your Phil
Merry Christmas to you and your family Phil.  Did Santa get you anything cool?  LOL
Merry Christmas Phil all the best in 2012
